Reviews.Title: Good; Needs Clearer Instructions
Reviews.Author: V. A. Beaver "Stickler for Quality"
Reviews.Content: If the instructions had been clearer, I'd have rated it a five. However, they're not. In order to do a lot of the set-up, you really need to have the thing hooked to your computer. It took me seemingly forever to figure out what I needed to do to set it up so that it'd catch motion to record my cats day and night. Even once you have the right software on your computer, it's not particularly intuitive.That said, the sucker works! I wish it held its charge better between uses, but overall, it did exactly what I needed it to. We have four cats. One started peeing outside the box. No matter how hard I tried, I could never catch any of them in the act. Knowing that could mean a health issue (and getting seriously ticked off about cleaning up pee four times a day), I needed to know who it was. This spy cam was the most affordable and the most appropriate to my needs.-It doesn't need to be hooked up to a computer to capture images.-It works on an internal, rechargeable battery OR plugged into a wall.-It has a motion sensor (so it doesn't needlessly drain the battery recording a blank wall)-It has a night mode for low-light environments (like small areas being lit by a night light)-It has a long enough charge time to record for hours.-It's small, so easily concealed (my cats are typical cats: insatiably curious, so this was a MUST).I finally caught the cat in question and was able to get her to the vet to figure out what was going on. She had multiple medical issues. Now I use it when I expect unsupervised visitors to our apartment.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Cartelli
Reviews.Content: I got this to try and catch the person who was coming into our office while we weren't there. I am not a technology person but this was very easy to set up - download the widget and choose the settings then turn the camera on and place it where you want it.  I used the motion detection mode and it picked up quite a bit, like when cars would go by in the parking lot and the headlights would sweep the room.  The image was clear provided there was enough light.  To view the recordings just connect to your computer with the USB.  You will need a memory card for it though.

Reviews.Title: very easy to configure and works very well
Reviews.Author: Carmen Jones "product junky"
Reviews.Content: For all of those that are hardware impaired like me, and who do not want to try to interprete a lot of badly translated instructions, this device is for you. This thing is great! All you have to do is download the widget, plug it into your computer via the usb cable that they supply, and you're in business. You configure it in a lot of differnt setting. Vibration, motion dectector. You can configure it to go on when the car starts and off when the car stops, or you can do the opposite and configure it to go on when the car stops and off when it starts. YOu do all those things in custom mode. there's also on the go mode and some other mode I can't remember. I don't know what on the go mode means.The picure quality is very good, if you ask me. I have it on the lowest resolution and it looks good. I don't think the angle is very wide though.The guide that comes with it is in english as in real english not some horrible translation. The site has a lot of information including the guide, videos taken by the device, FAQ, a support phone number and a email address. They're not hiding and let you know that there is no overseas office so you have to call the hong kong number or email them.I'm very glad I purchased this. I haven't used it but I've tested it. I have it set up for motion detection. when you turn on the device it starts to record for 10 seconds, then it stops. When it detects motion it starts and you can set it to record for 10, 15 or 30? minutes. after that time if there is no more motion it stops recording. You can set the sensitivity for motion detection and vibration trigger or voice trigger. it has a time date stamp and too. There's a firmware update for use on a MAC  i think. Its 1.1.14 on their site. It plays on windows media player and comes with a wall adapter, a car charger, mini usb to usb cable. I love this thing.

Reviews.Title: Won't work on a MAC?
Reviews.Author: Henson777
Reviews.Content: The seller failed to mention that this camera needs a windows based PC as an operating requirement.  With all the iPhones and MAC owners it seems like a given to mention it is not set up to work on a MAC.  They sent me some links to do something to help, but they did not work.  They should have just said you need a PC, and I would have just skipped ordering in the first place.  Now I need to return it.

Reviews.Title: It Works
Reviews.Author: Cornytheclown
Reviews.Content: Gave it 5 stars because it reached my expectations.  I want a camera that records video in a motion detecting mode so I can capture some of the 4 legged varmits around the back porch at night for curiosity and because I want to record a 2 legged bandit that steals my lawn mower gas and also steals from us when he is over here visiting.  Its a relative I know steals from us, he knows we know..... Id just like to present him with some photographic evidence. (screengrabs).Video quality is not great and Im not sure how it will work in very low light conditions but Im only interested in it working in sorta lit conditions to well lit conditions.Motion detecting works.Documentation is poor but there are enough resources on the net and the camera is simple enough for folks to fiqure it out.

Reviews.Title: Very impressed!
Reviews.Author: spoilsoflife124
Reviews.Content: This is definitly what I was looking for. Most cameras I've found were too big, too expensive, and/or couldn't store memory. I've tried "spy pens" and was sorely disappointed. This little guy here is incredible! It is almost as big as a credit card, but side with the camera lens is only 1.7 x 0.8 inches, so it's easy to hide in various places. The instructions were easy to follow. Mine came with a charger cord for the wall and the car and a USB cord for the PC. To set it up I simply had to connect the camcorder to my PC, download the widget from the website, choose my settings, and press a button to sync everything. I'm literally shocked that I haven't had any issues with it so far. I did a few test runs to see how large the camera angle is and how well it adjusts to light changes. Again, I couldn't be more impressed. You can set it up to start recording when it senses motion, voice, or vibration (or all three). It also has a night/day mode, or you can have it adjust to changes automatically (which, like I said, worked rather well). You can even set it to record right-side-up or upside-down! These are just a few of the main features that I found really useful. I don't intend to use it in the car, so I don't know how well that part works. The video quality is decent for surveillance and you can adjust the quality to save space. It also has audio.Pros:-Very small and discrete, not obvious that this is a camera just by looking at it-VERY simple and easy set up!!-Decent video/audio quality-Numerous recording options to choose fromCons:None so far!I would definitely recommend this to others! Might even pick up another one if the price stays right!

Reviews.Title: Only had this thing for a few days and it has already paid off
Reviews.Author: Charles F.
Reviews.Content: We recently hired a nanny.  On a whim I decided to set this up in our home office where she shouldn't be since the rest of the house is for our baby except for the home office.  Found her snooping around in all of our drawers.  Needless we are firing her.I'm going to pick up a few more of these and set them up all around the house.  They are so small you can't even tell they are a camera.  They look sort of like an old cell phone battery.

Reviews.Title: Does what it suppose to do but video quality is below expectations
Reviews.Author: alexrum
Reviews.Content: Camcorder works, which is not given for this type of stuff. Quite pricy at $100 and the video quality is far from great, blue lines go across screen, especially noticeable at lower light settings.It doesn't look like a camcorder though and allows inconspicuously place it on the dashboard, so have its uses...If you want good quality video look somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good video quality- totally useless as a motion activated device
Reviews.Author: CL/Edu
Reviews.Content: I got the zetta12 to use for surveillance on a bedroom that had been having some items go missing and put out of place when I wasn't around.Pros- Extremely discrete. It picks up audio extremely well, and the video quality under lowish to good lighting is quite good. In good lighting, you would probably be able to get a good look at someones face in detail. In low lighting, you would definitely be able to recognize someone you know. In very low lighting it's just a dark screen with lines.Cons- As for what I purchased it for its kind of a pain. I was hoping to just catch bits of video when anyone enters the room, which is what I programmed it to do. But it almost constantly records no matter what. Or when it isn't constantly recording it seems to record pretty randomly. In order to keep a good eye on the room I would need to go through hours of footage of an empty room and wait to see if someone comes in. I've tinkered with the settings to try it in all the possible motion triggers and it just doesn't function that way.I would not recommend it to someone who wants to use it for a similar purpose as mine.

Reviews.Title: SETTINGS
Reviews.Author: Rand Foster
Reviews.Content: I have tried multiple settings and tested over several days.  Shadows and noises will trigger the motion detector and burn up your battery resources fairly quickly with no useful video.I found that by turning off the vibration and audio detection then setting at low quality and low fpm that the video was still excellent and was fairly consistent with what triggers the recording.  The camera still records audio when it is recording video. I can get about 90 minutes of recordings over an 8 hour period on a battery recharge.  Still, you have to be careful about sunlight changes or reflections from vehicles or clouds outside a building that will cause it to record.

Reviews.Title: Features seem great
Reviews.Author: Gregory M. Stuhr
Reviews.Content: 1) Better built than expected2) User friendly3) Video quality POOR. - a whole lot of noise manifest as horizontal lines.  Tried changing night/day, frames, indoor lighting 50/60Hz.4) Compact5) Decent field of view6) Decent low light3b) video quality NOT acceptableUpdated.I have been trying different setting and lighting condition to no avail... Video quality is lousy.  I am going to see about returning...

Reviews.Title: Not Reliable
Reviews.Author: Sam "Sam"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the camera because I wanted motion detection in my office.  The camera itself is not bad at highest resolution in the day.  The only problem is, the unit is completely unreliable even when custom settings are established using the PC Widget.It either records clip after clip without worrying about motion at all.  Or it will just simply stop recording after around 30 minutes to an hour.  I have tried for the past 3 days using multiple settings to get myself on video entering my office at the END of the day (works in the morning when i start it up for about 30-60 minutes).  It never catches me walking into my office.  Very upsetting since that is the whole point of the unit.  The battery power is still sufficient at the end of the day.Has anyone else noticed this?

Reviews.Title: Save Your Money
Reviews.Author: Big Texas
Reviews.Content: The picture is extremely grainy indoors.  Motion, vibration, sound sensors are all poorly calibrated.  Battery life is awful.  Takes pretty bad video.  I figured, for under 100 bucks, I'd test it out.  I have installed and tested cameras for about 8 years now, so I've seen many different products.  This one is close to terrible.

Reviews.Title: I think it's a great little DVR camera.
Reviews.Author: Lazer
Reviews.Content: With all electronic surveillance gizmos, you've got to practice with them to use them successfully. I had mine set in the house for two days, to see what the different vibration, motion, and voice settings would do before I felt well versed enough to deploy it. It's out working on a petty theft case as I write this.I'd given it five stars, but the instructions are lacking. I'm still struggling with the three position switch: Surviellance, On the Go, and Custom. Since I tweaked the detection settings, that's where it is set and it works. I assume On the Go means vehicle. Dunno for sure.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Cam
Reviews.Author: Ernest Trujillo
Reviews.Content: Camcorder is easy to hide, just charge it, set your settings, and hit the on switch and record. Easy to use.

Reviews.Title: at last... a very handy little camera
Reviews.Author: JOHN
Reviews.Content: Its hard to give any of these cameras 5 stars… but I really do like this one… Besides stand alone operation with a very long battery life,  all its functions work on USB or battery power. Lots of programmable options (some work well)One thing I do love is its small footprint and the fact it doesn’t look like it is a dash cam.  In fact its quite stealth in any application,  With all flat surfaces it’s a snap o mount using Velcro,  I also like its output pix are in AVI.  Quality by day is very good.  No video display or unnecessary video outputs. but its not like I miss them…Pretty much it captures what is in front of it.  A smarter design would put the on/record light on the driver’s side of the unit.  However with a little trial and error its predictable and easy to use.  A half hour of continuous video (with sound) uses about 900 megs. .  After an overnight test on battery I found  the unit was still recording in the morning.Some have reported problems with Zetta software but  I like its widget that worked well for me.  Its on line instructions are easy to find in PDF and seem to be written by an “English speaking person” (they are at least easy to read).  Without any programming it works out of the box in 2 basic modes.  Once programmed its way more versatile.For me this is about as close to what I want as I may find…  Lots of uses for a camera like this, both stealth and general monitoring … I already ordered a second unit and stole the largest SD cards from other dash cams that were so  klunky I never used them.Last thing… night and low light operation  … Very important and a little strange with this camera.  It works well at night in headlight or limited streetlight light., it even picks up some infer red light “BUT” the auto light level setting gets confused, sometimes it  “blooms”, more often you see lines/streaks degrading the pix quality.  If other settings will not fix that… well I’m still pretty happy with this very useful toy “as is”.  It has major advantages over every dash cam or go-cam like device I tried to use.

Reviews.Title: It's ok for the price
Reviews.Author: LoneWolf
Reviews.Content: Video quality is ok. Sound quality isn't as clear as I'd like it to be. I seem to have trouble with it recording only when there is motion or sound detected. It wants to record non-stop. It is a good price, so I can't really complain. If I really wanted all these things I would have paid the big bucks.

Reviews.Title: Caught the thief!
Reviews.Author: Furniture maker
Reviews.Content: We had someone stealing cash.  Installed it the day it came in.  5 hours later caught a member of custodial staff digging thru drawers after hours.  Motion activation works well.

Reviews.Title: Reasonable Expectations Exceeded
Reviews.Author: Daniel Ryan
Reviews.Content: First purchase of any product in this category (mini cameras or cameras in general).This product is great (so far, have only had it for a few hours).  I purchased a Class 4 16 GB micro SD card and the recording is great.  It is easy to use with the downloaded widget off the website.  Micro SD inserts with the writing faced downwards (with the label on the camera also facing downwards).  I don't use SD cards at all so maybe this is normal or maybe not I don't know, I thought I would mention it though (simply for user's knowledge).

Reviews.Title: would recommend
Reviews.Author: jmarie
Reviews.Content: worked well for what I needed it for, some static in video though, would recommend this item,have not tried it as a dash cam yet.

Reviews.Title: Failed to operate as stated!!!
Reviews.Author: Lynette W. Coopoer
Reviews.Content: I have stayed up 2 nights trying to get the Zetta Z12 to operate properly. It has been doing its own thing. It will not hold a charge for very long. The pictures are not clear and very dark. I have switched modes and followed all directions. I wanted to use this for surveillance. However, it is not working like I thought it would. It has caused my laptop to mess up.I would like to return this item ASAP.Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Good camera with great features
Reviews.Author: Robert C. Tatum
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Zetta Z12 because it had a motion activation feature. I needed that feature to catch which one of my dogs was urinating on the living room floor. Sure enough, it did its job. I stuck the camera in place with double-backed foam tape and used the wall charger to constantly power the unit. I also set the camera to record over itself when the memory care became full. Any time the camera detects motion it records for five minutes, then shuts off unless there is still motion. When you connect the camera to your PC with the USB cable, it is very easy to quickly scroll through the video files to see the video you have captured.The only reason I gave the camera 4 stars instead of 5 is that the video quality is lacking compared to other cameras out there. It is certainly clear enough to catch the dog doing his business on the carpet, but it isn't any where near HD quality.

Reviews.Title: Dandy gadget, works really good!
Reviews.Author: Reluctant Reader
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for a reason to not give a five star rating for this product. I have found none. UPS delivered it to me about four days ago.Zetta has got a web site. I asked them two questions via e-mail. They responded with answers within about eight hours.One thing, you have got to buy a microSD card. Amazon dot com has got them. I bought one at a local store. You have to format the card before it will work (according to the Zetta web site). I formatted the card before using it. You can get instructions on how to format microSD cards from the Internet.There also is a YouTube video of a spy gadget tech person who analyzed and demonstrates this device.

Reviews.Title: Finally got one that works
Reviews.Author: SuperMatter
Reviews.Content: I had to order a second Z12 because the first one just recorded non-stop 10 minute clips regardless of voice, motion or vibration trigger settings and the video was very grainy.  Emailed the support (which is a link to a facebook page) but got no response.  Returned it and ordered a replacement.  The second Z12 works much better - voice mode is still not very selective but motion trigger actually works.  It still goes off for no visible reason - maybe from change in lighting coming into the room.  Video is decent - much better than on the first one.  I like the low profile of the device.Don't expect a super-sophisticated device but it does the job for under $80.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed
Reviews.Author: Steve "SDsteve6"
Reviews.Content: Poor picture quality and washed out color, especially in low light conditions. Expected much better for the price. I wouldn't reccommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: robert  m. lima
Reviews.Content: for the price, does a fantastic job. even on car cash board, while driving. definite would recommend. ill buy another !!!

Reviews.Title: Good audio and video
Reviews.Author: Lloyd sutton
Reviews.Content: I purchases this camera to use in my wife's school classroom. The video is great quality and the audio is good when only a few are in the room. It is a choir class and when the group is singing or lots of talking at the same time, the audio is very distorted. We'll keep the Zetta Z12 for future us in another setting, but will look for something else to suit our needs.

Reviews.Title: Best eye spy ever!
Reviews.Author: Rodica Candea
Reviews.Content: Great product, great pricing and  outstanding customer service. One that will put out of business many others just like magnetized water usage should.Many thanks, HK!

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: Richard M.
Reviews.Content: I have been very satisfied with this unit set up was easy,good quality,long battery life sound was also very good

Reviews.Title: Works very well once you get the site downloaded.
Reviews.Author: Kim Alxndr
Reviews.Content: I had a slight huccup while attempting to download the software from the website. One done, no problems, able to video every hour or by motion detect. Video quality is good for use needed, also color quality is also fine for security purposes. I would definatelyreccommend this camera for the price!

Reviews.Title: install was very confusing
Reviews.Author: singlebob123
Reviews.Content: it's NOT as easy as they say in the brochure, I had to have a friend come over and help me figure it out

Reviews.Title: Great for recording lots of "Nothing"  :(
Reviews.Author: camper
Reviews.Content: Records randomly on all settings. Low light is extremely grainy images. I bought  2 of these and both have same issues even after uploading updated software. Not very impressed. Battery will not even last 6 hours. Note: this is real time, not recording time since it just keeps recording on false signals. Set up for motion only on lowest sensitivity and left in empty room and got 6 hrs of nothing. Maybe it's picking up on "spirits" or something lol. Overall not impressed at all.

Reviews.Title: Low quality
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: I cant find a SD card to fit in the side so I have not yet been able to get it to work.

Reviews.Title: excellent camera options
Reviews.Author: LAS "LAS"
Reviews.Content: This camera is an excellent surveillance package.  Very tough, made well. Holds 32gb Sandisk and 8 hours of recording time. The programming is simple and all options work well.  But the camera recording is scratchy, not very clear.  Is not a good camera for auto (driving use). A better lens is in order.  I would rate higher with a clean video and better lens.

Reviews.Title: great product!
Reviews.Author: Paul C
Reviews.Content: This device is awesome, you can't beat it for the money, full function. Miniature and so on.The only problem I have with it is the ten minute recording time between triggers, I would like to set it for two minutes after it is triggered

Reviews.Title: Very cool and useful
Reviews.Author: David Hendry
Reviews.Content: Works so far as advertised. I find it very useful in my line of work, gives me the edge I'm looking for.On the down side without a "Auto Iris" function the video is highly washed out with any sun and or bright lights, must make sure you are not pointed into the light, easy.

Reviews.Title: NOT SURE
Reviews.Author: Don Crandall
Reviews.Content: THE MEMORY CARD WOULDN'T STAY IN! SO CAN'T SAY ABOUT ANYTHING ELSE! SEEMS LIKE IT WOULD HAVE BEEN IDEAL FOR MY PURPOSE, BUT HAD TO HOLD CARD IN TO EVEN SET IT UP WITH COMPUTER.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: DCrockett
Reviews.Content: Awesome!  Great product for the $$.  Instructions online are clear and easy to follow.  Video could be better, but can't really complain.

Reviews.Title: Is not great but gave it 4 stars due to the cost/benefit.
Reviews.Author: Mike Lundgren
Reviews.Content: It works, it will do the job, video is not awesome but it does not claim to be either.  Get what you pay for and for the money this was OK

Reviews.Title: Doesn't record
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "Happy Mother"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this twice.  The first time I purchased it I put the micro SD card in the wrong way and I think I messed up the camera.  So I repurchased both the camera and 32g micro SD card.  I was careful to put it in.  Well, the camera doesn't hold the SD card in place properly.  I can only get it to work if I press on the SD card.  I even tried holding it down with electrical tape but it still doesn't record.

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Good, caught a few people stealing my tools they didn't see it on top my tool box thought it was a tool or something

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Nathan Moraes
Reviews.Content: If wasn't for the grany image would be a 5 star! In perfect light conditions works very well. Better if outdoors.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Paul m Clarke
Reviews.Content: works real good wish I had order another at the same time ,good enough to catch predator. hope that I do ,

Reviews.Title: Excellent Service.
Reviews.Author: Pei H. Wu
Reviews.Content: I got a broken one from Amazon.com and inquired for a new one. They responded in a quick manner and I got the item renewed. They are really responsive to customer's request. If you are looking for excellent security camcorder, this is what I recommend.

Reviews.Title: Good idea features sound good but blue lines with video.
Reviews.Author: Tech fan
Reviews.Content: Im gonna give this item another try. I ordered one to keep my vehicle in check and the video play back had blue lines across screen. Was easy to setup easy to load easy to adjust time and settings. Ran a test and there were lines on video playback. tried to adjust settings hopping that would fix it but didn't change. I sent it back and reordered another. I hope this one is better I'm willing to give it another shot to increase and give it a better review.

Reviews.Title: Impressive Size
Reviews.Author: V.I. "book buyer"
Reviews.Content: Very impressed by the discreet size of the unit. Instructions need more details for the first time user.  Video quality is grainy.  Seller's turn around time was excellent.

Reviews.Title: Good Image and sound, poor directions and functionality
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I gave this three stars because it surpassed my expectations for video and sound quality.  The video was very clear, but had an odd color scheme. But still it was very good being that it was fairly inexpensive for such a small device.  The sound was superb.However, even with the Zetta widget the directions for using the different customization's were very confusing.  They also wouldn't work half the time.Basically only get if your looking for a small continuous recording camera.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Was fairly easy to setup, works great to take care of the job I needed it to do. Thanks so much!

Reviews.Title: great reasonably priced camcorder that does the job well
Reviews.Author: J in Virginia
Reviews.Content: This really works well and is easy to operate. Can't think of anything negative about this item. I bought a second one for another area I was wanting to monitor.

Reviews.Title: Zetta Z12 Security Camcorder
Reviews.Author: william
Reviews.Content: This recorder works very well mounted on the windshield for screening traffic patterns. If you have a fender bender,  just give the video to your insurance provider.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: Frostbeyet "Thermal"
Reviews.Content: nice device if the lines would go away. But still it can be used in very bright light and concealed.

Reviews.Title: best small security
Reviews.Author: Anna M
Reviews.Content: efficient, small and exactly as promised, this is high quality and would recommend for any one, simple and easy instructions

Reviews.Title: Excellent Quality, Easy to Use & Amazing Price!
Reviews.Author: sherri l
Reviews.Content: Easy to figure out (non-tech-type person).  Amazing quality & sound.  Will buy more as soon as I can afford it.  Limited income, but finding out alot of information when I'm at work in regard to what's going on at home.  I put in a box, 5 feet from the kid's bedroom door & monitor his activities. He has no clue it's there, right in front of him.  Can move it around to other areas easily.

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: Shawn
Reviews.Content: Very impressive, im glad i purchased it. It allowed me to perform multiple styles of recording which helped a lot.

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: Dan Reeder
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a camera to put on my boat when it is in storage. Works great and down loads easily.

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Paulo
Reviews.Content: Perfect camera for hidden scenarios. The battery is very good. The video quality is good too. The night mode is bad.

Reviews.Title: Has some problems with quality of videos
Reviews.Author: D. Groen
Reviews.Content: I received this on time and in good packaging but I am returning it due to the night videos are very very bad. The daytime video is very good and it looks like a great product so I ordered another in hopes that my unit was just a defective one.I will update this once the second one arrives and has been tested.Update 15 March 2014I received the second camera, which is in some ways better at the low light video but worse at the daylight video.I really like the size and abilities but the quality needs some work.Update 27 March 2014Got a third one and again the low light video was bad. This unit even came with scratches on the plastic casing. I did test the video just in case but this is not viable for the low light recording I need and the daytime video was worse on this unit then the last 2.Again I really like the features and size but it looks like the quality control is non-existentAfter 3 units I will not be getting/using this for my needs.

Reviews.Title: Great vallue
Reviews.Author: Disappointed
Reviews.Content: This is a good little surveillance camera for the money. Doesn't do very well in low light, but then again it's not inferred capable and the speakers aren't the greatest at a distance but they work well  you're not too far away, I also did not like that the software for this product shows as security risk. However, the camera itself works quite well. The picture was clear (as long as you didn't try to record over other frames) and if the camera was within a short distance it also picked up voice pretty good. Overall the camera serves it's purpose and works pretty well for the price. The biggest drawback is not being able to watch it live, but I knew that when I ordered it. the second biggest drawback is the software (not sure if it's safe or not).

Reviews.Title: a true spy tool
Reviews.Author: abc_warbot
Reviews.Content: Price, and uses, can be used in a car, or on its own battery. Very versatile. Iall it needs is to be water proof and it would be perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great device. worked as promised.
Reviews.Author: Tom Vassos
Reviews.Content: Great device. worked as promised. video a little grainy (i may be able to increase the resolution in my settings) but easy to see exactly who is in the video. especially like the motion sensor that automatically turns the video on.

Reviews.Title: ok product
Reviews.Author: general user "general user"
Reviews.Content: Records very good in daylight at highest resolution settings.  However during evening low light situations you get a ton of very grainy horizontal lines across the screen obscuring view.  I experimented with different settings and using battery or AC adapter and nothing made an improvement.  I'll definitely use it for daytime but find a better product for low light. Microphone is just ok.  Recording file sizes are very large so I would recommend buying a 32gb Micro SDHC High Speed Class 4 card B004G7D0EG  in addition.  My last recording was approx 9 hours and took up over 8gb memory.  On a tangent, if you are also interested in a good audio only device I have been very impressed with the "MEMOQ" MQ-77N ink pen I recently purchased. Instructions were in poor english but after you get through the setup it's very easy to use and records well. Totally inconspicuous with extremely small mic hole and it writes. May not be able to get it through amazon. Think I got mine at penrecorderpro.com for $130 but it may be $139 now. Teton Webstores actually mailed it to me.

Reviews.Title: POS
Reviews.Author: arpy
Reviews.Content: Never could get it to work.......can't find the box it came in to send it back fast enough.  Just another POS dash cam.

Reviews.Title: Thanks for no customer support!
Reviews.Author: dude
Reviews.Content: I have tried every mode from express to custom and it will run with partitions untill it's out of memory. Even with sound and vibration disabled and motion on low it still keeps running and running???No answers from the company at all!It has good video quality and that's why it gets 2stars . Probably good for driving but mine is bad. And yes I did put it on the custom switch when trying it out..

Reviews.Title: Confusing Directions.
Reviews.Author: Richard Reese
Reviews.Content: I still can't configure it as I would like.  I want to use it as a security camera.  I can't seem to get the motion activation to work. The directions are not very clear on what settings need to be used.  The unit has three settings and neither of them seem to work with the settings I installed on the computer.  I would look elsewhere next time.

Reviews.Title: Grainy quality
Reviews.Author: What-SF
Reviews.Content: And does not seem to want to adjust to the motion detection setting, meaning the camera is on all the time.But I am working on sorting this out.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Cyrus J. Roxas "CROXAS"
Reviews.Content: This camera works great!  It's small enough to fit into household objects and strange looking enough to leave it out.  I've used it to spy on my dog walker to make sure she's doing what she's paid for.  I used the Zetta widget to customize the motion activation.  It recorded all day including when I came home from work that day.  The video is not HD, but the auto day/night settings are very helpful.The only thing i would improve is the video quality.  in darker situations there are streaky blue lines flashing across the screen.  can't complain though.  This is a cheap camera.

Reviews.Title: So far - so good
Reviews.Author: Rich M.
Reviews.Content: For the small size of this camera and what it can do I feel it is a real good deal .Not very hard to operate. The only problem for me not being real computer savvy was getting in to the Zetta widget site, not knowing if it is a secure site type of thing.This is the reason for 4 stars not 5. But got everything working with the custom settings.Motion detection works very good.Used it a little as a dash cam,I think it would make a good R/C camera.Great spy camera.Picture quality go's back to size and price, I'm happy.

Reviews.Title: Works really well.
Reviews.Author: Edward Cottrill
Reviews.Content: Small and compact.  picture quality is pretty good even in low light. I like the fact that it works while being charged.

Reviews.Title: It insulted my intelligence
Reviews.Author: Doris M Wolter
Reviews.Content: Was not at all user friendly.  Directions were incomplete and gave 3 different ways of inserting USB cord to download.  Three times it said it was downloading and after an hour and a  half I cancelled the download because it never  finished.  Did not see where to get help for installation.  Returning.

Reviews.Title: Zetta Z12
Reviews.Author: R. Milburn
Reviews.Content: Can't even really get it to work.  Must hire someone to help me.  Not good.  Yack, yack, yack, yack, yack.

ProductInfo.Features:
Motion-Activated Video & Audio Recording
Plug-in Device or Battery Life of 8 Hours (90 Day Standby Time)
Excellent Low Light Recording Capabilities
Includes Vibration Triger, Motion-Activated and Voice Activated Modes
Takes up to Up to 32GB Micro SD Card (Not Included)
ProductInfo.Name: Zetta Z12 Intelligent Security Camcorder
